title: Deutsche Bank
content:
Education: Integrated course from a Tier-1 college in India
Years of Experience: 1.5
Prior Experience: SDE2 at Google UK
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: SDE2 / L3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 20,90,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: No signing bonus as I'm a rehire case, relocation will be cash but they haven't announced the amount yet.
Stock bonus: 13,50,000 (First year, 38%)
Bonus: 3,14,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 37,54,000
Benefits: 3 Meals on working days, cab to pick up and drop off, PF contribution, good medical plan, all standard Google benefits.
Other details: None

Timeline:

Got layed off from Google UK
Got into an investment bank and my offer got rescinded 2 days before joining. Double shock!!
I was holding an offer from a startup whose first year comp was ~39,00,000 (2,50,000 startup stocks). A friend from Google contacted if I'll be interested in joining his team. Apparently hiring manager talked to my ex-manager and he received a good feedback. They hired me without any interviews becasue it's been < 1 year since I've left Google.

Relocation/Signing Bonus: No signing bonus as I'm a rehire case, relocation will be cash but they haven't announced the amount yet.
Stock bonus: 13,50,000 (First year, 38%)
Bonus: 3,14,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 37,54,000
Benefits: 3 Meals on working days, cab to pick up and drop off, PF contribution, good medical plan, all standard Google benefits.
Other details: None 

Timeline:
1) Got layed off from Google UK
2) Got into an investment bank and my offer got rescinded 2 days before joining. Double shock!!
3) I was holding an offer from a startup whose first year comp was ~39,00,000 (2,50,000 startup stocks). A friend from Google contacted if I'll be interested in joining his team. Apparently hiring manager talked to my ex-manager and he received a good feedback. They hired me without any interviews becasue it's been < 1 year since I've left Google.
